    • Method Detail

      • newSSLHandler

        public io.netty.handler.ssl.SslHandler newSSLHandler(io.netty.channel.socket.SocketChannel channel)
        Description copied from interface: SSLOptions
        Creates a new SSL handler for the given Netty channel.

        This gets called each time the driver opens a new connection to a Cassandra host. The newly created handler will be added to the channel's pipeline to provide SSL support for the connection.

        You don't necessarily need to implement this method directly; see the provided implementations: JdkSSLOptions and NettySSLOptions.

        Specified by:
        newSSLHandler in interface SSLOptions
        Overrides:
        newSSLHandler in class JdkSSLOptions
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel.
        Returns:
        the handler.

      • newSSLHandler

        public io.netty.handler.ssl.SslHandler newSSLHandler(io.netty.channel.socket.SocketChannel channel,
                                                     EndPoint remoteEndpoint)
        Description copied from interface: ExtendedRemoteEndpointAwareSslOptions
        Creates a new SSL handler for the given Netty channel and the given remote endpoint.

        This gets called each time the driver opens a new connection to a Cassandra host. The newly created handler will be added to the channel's pipeline to provide SSL support for the connection.

        You don't necessarily need to implement this method directly; see the provided implementations: RemoteEndpointAwareJdkSSLOptions and RemoteEndpointAwareNettySSLOptions.

        Specified by:
        newSSLHandler in interface ExtendedRemoteEndpointAwareSslOptions
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel.
        remoteEndpoint - the remote endpoint information.
        Returns:
        a newly-created SslHandler.

      • newSSLHandler

        public io.netty.handler.ssl.SslHandler newSSLHandler(io.netty.channel.socket.SocketChannel channel,
                                                     InetSocketAddress remoteEndpoint)
        Description copied from interface: RemoteEndpointAwareSSLOptions
        Creates a new SSL handler for the given Netty channel and the given remote endpoint.

        This gets called each time the driver opens a new connection to a Cassandra host. The newly created handler will be added to the channel's pipeline to provide SSL support for the connection.

        You don't necessarily need to implement this method directly; see the provided implementations: RemoteEndpointAwareJdkSSLOptions and RemoteEndpointAwareNettySSLOptions.

        Specified by:
        newSSLHandler in interface RemoteEndpointAwareSSLOptions
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel.
        remoteEndpoint - the remote endpoint address.
        Returns:
        a newly-created SslHandler.
